education.summary:
• Graduated with Distinction        CGPA:9.08 

• Relevant Coursework: Software Engineering , Object Oriented Programming, Computer Organization & Microprocessor, Algorithms and Data Structures, Systems Programming, Advanced Web Programming , Data Science, Database Management Systems, Computer Networks, Android Programming , Numerical Methods & Statistical Techniques, Artificial Intelligence,Linux Administration .

anozie-stores.name: ChatValve
anozie-stores.description: ChatValve is a Real Time End-To-End Encrypted Messaging application. It is full stack project built using React Native and Aws Amplify .                                                                                                                Key Features : Encryption and Security,Registration page and contact integration,Offers both private and group chats,View Online Status , Messages : Audio Message,Text Messages ,Images.

whatsapp-web-clone.name: Netflix Clone
whatsapp-web-clone.description: Recreated the current Netflix Application. Best part? Added the backend functionality as well.Hoping to add more features in future.

scribbles-blog.name: AirSense
scribbles-blog.description: It is an Machine learning based Android mobile application to provide real time air quality index using camera images which is reliable and inexpensive . User also get Maps and Statistics of Weather.

gff.name: Search Engine Simulation
gff.description: Project Mimics the Functionality of a Web Browsers Search Engine. Implemented Splay Tree data structure , to access recent Data Efficiently. Standard Implementation using structures, nodes and classes have been used to implement this project.

portfolio-v2.name: Personal Portfolio Website
portfolio-v2.description: Designed a Beautiful lightweight accessible and performant personal portfolio website using Html,Css ,JavaScript and React js.It doubles as some sort of Digital resume.

abeg-app-clone.name: Rock Paper Scissors
abeg-app-clone.description: This is a project example of the game Rock Paper Scissors built with Html, Css, Javacript.

pasteit.name: TicTacToe
pasteit.description: This is a project example of the game TicTacToe built with React Native. Hoping to add Multiplayer Functionality in Future.
